title: Here’s the best cycling kit deals from Pactimo’s Summer Sale
content:
Looking for a new cycling kit but don’t want to break the bank? We were already fans of Pactimo’s muted Range and lightweight, aero Ascent collections…and now they’re up to 30% off. Whether you’re looking for casual comfort on the gravel or mountain bike, or maximum aerodynamics and breathability on the asphalt, this sale has […]

The post Here’s the best cycling kit deals from Pactimo’s Summer Sale appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Harley Schafer
